page.title: 19A Child's Day in Kirtlington
page.content: I get up at 7.00 a.m. and have breakfast of cereal and fruit juice. I get to school to start work at 9 o'clock. Morning break is from 10.40 a.m. to 10.55 a.m.. Lunch (e.g. chicken pie followed by jam and cream buns) is at 12 noon and costs 65 pence. School starts again at 1.15 p.m. and finishes at 3.25 p.m.. We take part in Assembly and News and Views. We work at projects, Language and Mathematics with help from the computer. We may watch a video or do movement with taped music, or games outside. At 3.00 p.m. we have our story before going home. I have a snack and then I go out to play. Sometimes I miss television! After supper I get ready for bed. I read to myself and then fall asleep. I am 5 years old and this is my life style.
